description: Decorative crescent openings in the ceiling grant a view of the sky above.  Moonlight filters through the openings, softly illuminating the chamber.  A small white owl rests nearby, alert but unafraid.  Its song is repetitive, but reassuring.

Decorative crescent openings in the ceiling grant a view of the sky above and create a pretty pattern of shadows upon the floor as the sunlight overhead filters through.  A small white bird trilling a pleasant song is perched nearby, quite at ease in one of the slivered vents.
title: [Dome of Memories]
